00020 #include "stack.h"
00021 #include <sys/types.h>
00022 #include <sstream>
00023 
00024 namespace PosixConstructs {
00025 
00026 string Context::toString()
00027 {
00028     ostringstream oss;
00029     oss << file << ":" << line << ", " << function << "(), reason '" << why << "'";
00030     return oss.str();
00031 }
00032 
00033 Stack operator+(const Stack&a,const Stack&b) {
00034     std::vector<Context> stack;
00035     stack.insert(stack.end(),a.stack.begin(), a.stack.end());
00036     stack.insert(stack.end(),b.stack.begin(), b.stack.end());
00037     return Stack(stack);
00038 }
00039 
00040 string Stack::toString()
00041 {
00042     std::ostringstream oss; 
00043     
00044     oss << "\t Stack with " << stack.size() << " contexts: \n";
00045     
00046     for (size_t i = 0; i < stack.size(); i++) {
00047         oss << "\t " << i << "  - " << 
00048          stack[i].toString() + "\n";
00049     }
00050     return oss.str();
00051 }
00052 
00053 } // namespace
